lead_paragraph: “The Bach Dynasty,” at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin, near Times Square, was an offering from the Miller Theater’s Early Music series.

headline.print_headline: Exploration of Bach’s Family Tree Yields Fruit
headline.main: Review: Vox Luminis Explores Bach’s Family Tree

snippet: “The Bach Dynasty,” at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin, near Times Square, was an offering from the Miller Theater’s Early Music series.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews concert The Bach Dynasty performed by Vox Luminis vocal music group at Church of St Mary the Virgin, part of Miller Theater's Early Music series.
